v.v: Yahweh, I give myself to you.
My God, I trust in you.
Do not allow any of those who trust in you to be ashamed.
Yahweh, show me the way that I should conduct my life,
Teach me to conduct my life by obeying your truth
Yahweh, do not forget how you have acted mercifully to me and have faithfully loved me because of your covenant with me;
Forgive me for all the sinful things I did and the ways that I rebelled against you when I was young;
Yahweh is good and fair,
He shows humble people what is right for them to do
He always faithfully loves us and does what he has promised
Yahweh, forgive me for all my sins, which are many,
To all those who have an awesome respect for you,
They will always be prosperous,
Yahweh is a friend of those who have an awesome respect for him,
I always request Yahweh to help me,
Yahweh, pay attention to me and be merciful to me because I am alone,
I have many troubles that make me afraid;
Note that I am distressed and troubled,
Note that I have many enemies;
Protect me and rescue me from them;
Protect me because I do what is good and honest
God, rescue us Israelite people from all of our troubles!

v: Do not allow my enemies to defeat me
and shame me.
Do not allow my enemies to defeat me
and rejoice over me.
Cause those who act treacherously toward others to be disgraced.
teach me how to act in the manner that you want me to act.
because you are my God, the one who saves me.
All during the day I trust in you.
that is the way that you have acted toward me from long ago.
I request this because you faithfully love your people and do good things for them, as you promised in your covenant.
Yahweh, do not forget me!
so he shows sinners how they should conduct their lives.
and teaches them what he wants them to do.
for those who obey his covenant and who do what he requires.
in order that I may honor you.
you show them the right way to conduct their lives.
and their descendants will continue to live in this land.
and he teaches them the covenant that he made with them.
and he rescues me from danger.
and I am greatly distressed because I am suffering.
rescue me from them.
and forgive me for all my sins.
you see that they hate me very much.
do not allow them to defeat me
with the result that I would be ashamed;
I have gone to you to get refuge.
and because I trust in you.
